targets.rawSql:
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(pos.datum) as time_sec, lat, lng, 3 as type, concat('Online:', IFNULL(display_name,'') ,'
',IFNULL(battery_level,0), '% SOC
', IFNULL(address,'')) as address FROM pos join cars on pos.carid = cars.id join (SELECT max(id) as id FROM pos group by carid) as p2 on p2.id = pos.id join (select carid from state where enddate is null and state = 'online') as state on state.carid = pos.CarID union SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(pos.datum) as time_sec, lat, lng, 2 as type, concat('Fahren:', IFNULL(display_name,'') ,'
',IFNULL(battery_level,0), '% SOC
', speed, ' km/h') as address FROM pos join cars on pos.carid = cars.id join (SELECT max(id) as id FROM pos group by carid) as p2 on p2.id = pos.id join (select carid from drivestate where enddate is null) as state on state.carid = pos.CarID union SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(pos.datum) as time_sec, lat, lng, 1 as type, concat('Laden:', IFNULL(display_name,'') ,'
',IFNULL(battery_level,0), '% SOC
', power * -1, ' kW') as address FROM pos join cars on pos.carid = cars.id join (SELECT max(id) as id FROM pos group by carid) as p2 on p2.id = pos.id join (select carid from chargingstate where enddate is null) as state on state.carid = pos.CarID union SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(pos.datum) as time_sec, lat, lng, 4 as type, concat('Schlafen:', IFNULL(display_name,'') ,'
',IFNULL(battery_level,0), '% SOC
', IFNULL(address,'')) as address FROM pos join cars on pos.carid = cars.id join (SELECT max(id) as id FROM pos group by carid) as p2 on p2.id = pos.id join (select carid from state where enddate is null and state in ('offline','asleep')) as state on state.carid = pos.CarID
